hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Bolero of Fire#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Green Rupee# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Hylian Shield# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a medium-sized fish (adult)# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Fire Temple# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Why won't anyone acknowledge the housing crisis in Kakariko Village?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #4# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Map of the Water Temple#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ 3 Spinning Pots Wonderitem

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bow#.
